XIII.i.4.C.1.d
.
When to Prepare a Rating for Dental Treatment Purposes
As specified in
38 CFR 3.381(a)
, VBA will develop and preare a decision for a claim for SC for dental treatment purposes
only after
VHA
determines that a Veteran meets the basic eligibility requirements of
38 CFR 17.161
, and
requests
that VBA make a determination (by providing required information or issuing a rating decision).
Important
:  Provide
only
the determination requested.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Ratings for Dental Treatment Purposes
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
